markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Consumable](/Traits.aspx?ID=36)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 630 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

An item with this trait can be used only once. Unless stated otherwise, it's destroyed after activation. Consumable items include [alchemical items](/equipment/alchemical-items) and magical consumables such as [scrolls](/equipment/consumables/scrolls) and [talismans](/equipment/consumables/talismans). When a character creates consumable items, they can make them in batches of four.
name: Consumable
